video.title: Easily Build an Airbnb Clone with Sharetribe - Tutorial
video.description:
Build and launch your own Airbnb-style marketplace using Sharetribe GO in about 30 minutes.

This tutorial walks you through initial signup to building and launching an Airbnb-style marketplace using Sharetribe's hosted marketplace platform (and every step along the way). 

Note: Sharetribe has a monthly fee. They do not have a free plan but they have a free trial.

Resources: 
🔗Sharetribe (Marketplace platform): http://bit.ly/2gXICOV
🔗Sharetribe Marketplace Examples: http://marketplacedirectory.carrd.co

Tutorial from Mike Williams.
💻Check out his YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC00XnZc8SVr_Nd2K78qb8ag
🐦Mike on Twitter: https://twitter.com/yoroomie
🔗Mike's website: http://www.iammikewilliams.com

--

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.com

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://medium.freecodecamp.com

topLevelComment.text: Unfortunate there is only one set price per night making it pretty useless for an airbnb type marketplace due to the high and low seasons, alongside weekends

topLevelComment.author: Craig Mullins
topLevelComment.text: CAn't we run the self hosted version and do this? Or do they nto have self hosted version?

replies.author: Mike Williams
replies.text: Yes, this is using the hosted version (what they call Sharetribe GO). They also have an open source version and then Flex.

topLevelComment.author: Dev Gupta
topLevelComment.text: Can you make video on cloning facebook or gmail ?

topLevelComment.author: Sharetribe
topLevelComment.text: Great video! This tutorial covers the setup quite nicely, and if you have any additional questions, be sure to drop us a line at help@sharetribe.com or through the admin panel chat tool - we'll be happy to help :)
